1.0.2.name: connect20/Fris_Socialbuttons
1.0.2.description:
Let your visitors do your marketing while you sleep! 
Adds product-specific share buttons for several social networks to your product display pages. Works great with the analytics provided by Pinterest etc. to analyse return traffic.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
